resources.string: Vimal Tormal Poddar BCA And Commerce College was established under the Shri Mahavir Vidyamandir Trust, which since its inception in 1996 has been involved in imparting quality education to students from KG to college levels. The Trust commenced its activities by setting up a Shishumandir for children way back in 1996. Since then the Trust has set up three colleges for providing quality education to students coming from disadvantaged sections of society.

Vimal Tormal Poddar BCA college has been set up in the year 2007. Since then, the college has trained hundreds of students in computer technology. College has emerged as the top ranking SFI college affiliated to Veer Narmad South Gujarat University. More than 90% of the students appearing for final year examinations manage to clear the examinations with flying colours.
